abstract: Brooklyn Dist Atty Kenneth P Thompson will appeal Justice ShawnDya L Simpson's decision to overturn 1991 conviction of Rosean S Hargrave due to flawed detective work by now-retired homicide detective Louis Scarcella; Hargave, who had been sentenced at age 17 to 30 years to life for murder of off-duty correction officer, was released from prison in April after serving 20 years and granted new trial.
lead_paragraph: Rosean S. Hargrave has served over 20 years in prison and was released in April after a State Supreme Court judge said his conviction was based on flawed detective work.

headline.main: Brooklyn District Attorney to Appeal New Trial for Man Convicted in 1991 Killing
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors to Fight Brooklyn Judge’s Order for New Trial in ’91 Killing
